channel.title: Webclient error
channel.description:
Hiya all,
Iam trying to make a webclient for my server but it kept saying:
classnotfoundexception: client.class
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/v7wl6d.png[/img]
I followed This tut :[url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=336494.0]Ric's webclient tut[/url]
Also i made a jar when i double click on the jar that i made it complete works and also downloading the cache. Also When i run the.bat file(thats made from the jar) iget NONE errors!
I only get that error when i try to run it on my webclient.
Anyone knows how to fix that problem?
Thanks!
, Love 3009

item.title: Webclient error
item.dc:creator: @Love_3009 Love 3009
item.description:
@Love_3009 wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:2, topic:472041”]Post the Batch file you’re attempting to initiate it with. If you aren’t using one, check the Tick Box when creating the file. I assume you would tell us if it was packaged or not.

P.S. Client Help (wrong section)[/quote]

I followed This tut :Ric’s webclient tut

Also i made a jar when i double click on the jar that i made it complete works and also downloading the cache.
Also When i run the.bat file(thats made from the jar) iget NONE errors!

I only get that error when i try to run it on my webclient.

Read full topic
